verses.verse: And Benjamin<WH1144> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Bela<WH1106> his first-born, Ashbel<WH788> the second,<WH8145> Aharah<WH315> the third,<WH7992>
Nohah<WH5119> the fourth,<WH7243> and Rapha<WH7498> the fifth.<WH2549>
And Bela<WH1106> had<WH1961> sons:<WH1121> Addar,<WH146> Gera,<WH1617> Abihud,<WH31>
Abishua,<WH50> Naaman,<WH5283> Ahoah,<WH265>
Gera,<WH1617> Shephuphan,<WH9625> and Huram.<WH2361>

And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Ehud:<WH261> these<WH428> are the heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Geba,<WH1387> and they carried<WH1540> them into exile<WH1540> to Manahath,<WH9273>
namely, Naaman,<WH5283> Ahijah,<WH281> and Gera<WH1617> â€“ he carried<WH1540> them into exile;<WH1540> and he became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Uzza<WH5798> and Ahihud.<WH284>

And Shaharaim<WH7842> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of children in the country<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> after<WH4480> he had sent<WH7971> away<WH7971> Hushim<WH2366> and Baara<WH1199> his wives.<WH802>
And by Hodesh<WH2321> his wife<WH802> he became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jobab,<WH3103> Zibia,<WH6644> Mesha,<WH4331> Malcam,<WH9266>
Jeuz,<WH3263> Sachia,<WH9600> Mirmah.<WH4821> These<WH428> were his sons,<WH1121> heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households.]
And by Hushim<WH2366> he became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Abitub<WH36> and Elpaal.<WH508>
And the sons<WH1121> of Elpaal<WH508> [were] Eber,<WH5677> Misham,<WH4936> and Shemed,<WH9612> who<WH1931> built<WH1129> Ono<WH207> and Lod,<WH3850> with its towns;<WH1323>

and Beriah<WH1283> and Shema,<WH8087> who<WH1992> were heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Aijalon,<WH357> who<WH1992> put<WH1272> to flight<WH1272> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gath;<WH1661>
and Ahio,<WH283> Shashak,<WH8349> and Jeremoth.<WH3406>
And Zebadiah,<WH2069> Arad,<WH9436> Eder,<WH5738>
Michael,<WH4317> Ishpah,<WH3472> and Joha<WH3109> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Beriah.<WH1283>
And Zebadiah,<WH2069> Meshullam,<WH4918> Hizki,<WH2395> Heber,<WH2268>
Ishmerai,<WH3461> Izliah,<WH3152> and Jobab<WH3103> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Elpaal.<WH508>
And Jakim,<WH3356> Zichri,<WH2147> Zabdi,<WH2067>
Elienai,<WH462> Zillethai,<WH6769> Eliel,<WH447>
Adaiah,<WH5718> Beraiah,<WH1256> and Shimrath<WH8119> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Shimei.<WH8096>
And Ishpan,<WH3473> Eber,<WH5677> Eliel,<WH447>
Abdon,<WH5658> Zichri,<WH2147> Hanan,<WH2605>
Hananiah,<WH2608> Elam,<WH9405> Anthothijah,<WH6070>
Iphdeiah,<WH3301> and Penuel<WH6439> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Shashak.<WH8349>
And Shamsherai,<WH8125> Shehariah,<WH7841> Athaliah,<WH6271>
Jaareshiah,<WH3298> Elijah,<WH452> and Zichri<WH2147> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Jeroham.<WH3395>
These<WH428> were heads<WH7218> of the fathers' [households] according to their generations,<WH8435> chief<WH7218> men,<WH7218> who<WH428> lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Now in Gibeon,<WH1391> [Jeiel,] the father of Gibeon<WH1> lived,<WH1391> and his wife's name<WH3427> was Maacah;<WH8034>
and his first-born son<WH1121> [was] Abdon,<WH5658> then Zur,<WH6698> Kish,<WH7027> Baal,<WH9058> Nadab,<WH5070>
Gedor,<WH1446> Ahio,<WH283> and Zecher.<WH2144>

And Mikloth<WH4732> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Shimeah.<WH8039> And they also<WH637> lived<WH3427> with their relatives<WH251> in Jerusalem<WH3389> opposite<WH5048> their [other] relatives.<WH251>

And Ner<WH5369> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Kish,<WH7027> and Kish<WH7027> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Saul,<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jonathan,<WH3083> Malchi-shua, Abinadab,<WH41> and Eshbaal.<WH792>
And the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> [was] Merib-baal, and Merib-baal became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Micah.<WH4318>
And the sons<WH1121> of Micah<WH4318> [were] Pithon,<WH6377> Melech,<WH4429> Tarea,<WH8390> and Ahaz.<WH271>

And Ahaz<WH271> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jehoaddah,<WH3085> and Jehoaddah<WH3085> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Alemeth,<WH5964> Azmaveth,<WH5820> and Zimri;<WH2174> and Zimri<WH2174> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Moza.<WH4162>
And Moza<WH4162> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Binea;<WH1150> Raphah<WH9572> [was] his son,<WH1121> Eleasah<WH501> his son,<WH1121> Azel<WH682> his son.<WH1121>

And Azel<WH682> had six<WH8337> sons,<WH1121> and these<WH428> [were] their names:<WH8034> Azrikam,<WH5840> Bocheru,<WH1074> Ishmael,<WH3458> Sheariah,<WH8187> Obadiah<WH5662> and Hanan.<WH2605> All<WH3605> these<WH428> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Azel.<WH682>
And the sons<WH1121> of Eshek<WH6232> his brother<WH251> [were] Ulam<WH198> his first-born, Jeush<WH3266> the second,<WH8145> and Eliphelet<WH467> the third.<WH7992>

And the sons<WH1121> of Ulam<WH198> were mighty<WH1368> men<WH376> of valor,<WH2428> archers,<WH1869> <WH7198> and had<WH7235> many<WH7235> sons<WH1121> and grandsons,<WH1121> 150 [of them.] All<WH3605> these<WH428> [were] of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin.<WH1144>
